mutations.name: Mythic Attack-Defense Synergy
mutations.description: Creates a godlike synergy between Attack and Defense groups
mutations.synergyEffect: When Attack and Defense groups are present, both receive a godlike attribute bonus
mutations.effectDescription: When Attack and Defense groups are present, both receive a 75% attribute bonus

mutations.name: Mythic Control-Movement Synergy
mutations.description: Creates a godlike synergy between Control and Movement groups
mutations.synergyEffect: When Control and Movement groups are present, both receive a godlike attribute bonus
mutations.effectDescription: When Control and Movement groups are present, both receive a 75% attribute bonus

mutations.name: Mythic Core Resonance
mutations.description: Creates a godlike synergy between Core and any other group
mutations.synergyEffect: Core group provides a godlike attribute bonus to all other groups
mutations.effectDescription: Core group provides a 50% attribute bonus to all other groups

mutations.name: Perfect Harmony
mutations.description: Creates a godlike synergy when all five role groups are present
mutations.synergyEffect: When all five role groups are present, all receive a godlike attribute bonus
mutations.effectDescription: When all five role groups are present, all receive a 50% attribute bonus

mutations.name: Ability Transcendence Synergy
mutations.description: Creates a synergy that transcends ability effects across groups
mutations.synergyEffect: All groups gain extraordinary ability effectiveness bonuses based on the number of different roles present
mutations.effectDescription: All groups gain 20% ability effectiveness for each different role present in the creature

mutations.name: Unified Consciousness
mutations.description: Creates a unique synergy that allows all groups to share their primary attributes
mutations.synergyEffect: All groups share a percentage of their primary attribute with all other groups
mutations.effectDescription: Each group shares 25% of its primary attribute value with all other groups
